channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 05:32 Air alert in Sumy region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 05:32 Air alert in Sumy region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Сумська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 05:13 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
